oai_dc:dc.dc:title: The keys to success of bull breeding soundness exams
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Koziol, Jennifer
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Bull breeding soundness exams are one of the most important tasks that we perform as bovine veterinarians. This exam is de­signed to identify subfertile and infertile bulls which if used in a breeding scenario can result in loss of dollars for the produc­er. This loss of income comes from reduction in calves hitting the ground, a longer calving season, and in total less pounds of calf at the time of weaning.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: American Association of Bovine Practitioners Conference Proceedings; No. 57 (2024): 2024 Recent Graduate Conference Proceedings; 27-28
